channel.title: Send selected lines as one task in iOS Reminders | Drafts Action Directory
channel.description:
Posted by @scripts4drafts, Last update 4 minutes ago

[Basic script for @draftsapp] How to send multiple selected lines as one task in iOS Reminders, edit the first line and move the cursor to the end of the last line ?

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/1W6
